channel.title: DNS Providers :: Let’s Encrypt client and ACME library written in Go.
channel.description: Important lego is an independent, free, and open-source project, if you value it, consider supporting it! ❤️ This project is not owned by a company. I’m not an employee of a company. I don’t have gifted domains/accounts from DNS companies. I’ve been maintaining it for about 10 years. Configuration and Credentials Credentials and DNS configuration for DNS providers must be passed through environment variables.

item.title: Akamai EdgeDNS
item.description: Akamai edgedns supersedes FastDNS; implementing a DNS provider for solving the DNS-01 challenge using Akamai EdgeDNS

item.title: Brandit (deprecated)
item.description: Brandit has been acquired by Abion. Abion has a different API. If you are a Brandit/Albion user, you can try the PR https://github.com/go-acme/lego/pull/2112.

item.title: CloudXNS (Deprecated)
item.description: The CloudXNS DNS provider has shut down.

item.title: Designate DNSaaS for Openstack
item.description: Configuration for Designate DNSaaS for Openstack.

item.title: DNSPod (deprecated)
item.description: Use the Tencent Cloud provider instead.

item.title: External program
item.description: Solving the DNS-01 challenge using an external program.

item.title: Google Domains
item.description: The Google Domains DNS provider has shut down.

item.title: IIJ DNS Platform Service
item.description: Configuration for IIJ DNS Platform Service.

item.title: ISPConfig 3 - Dynamic DNS (DDNS) Module
item.description: Configuration for ISPConfig 3 - Dynamic DNS (DDNS) Module.

item.title: iwantmyname (Deprecated)
item.description: The iwantmyname API has shut down. https://github.com/go-acme/lego/issues/2563

item.title: Manual
item.description: Solving the DNS-01 challenge using CLI prompt.

item.title: Namecheap
item.description: Configuration for Namecheap. To enable API access on the Namecheap production environment, some opaque requirements must be met. More information in the section Enabling API Access of the Namecheap documentation. (2020-08: Account balance of $50+, 20+ domains in your account, or purchases totaling $50+ within the last 2 years.)

item.title: Volcano Engine/火山引擎
item.description: Configuration for Volcano Engine/火山引擎.
